title: The Power of Perception
description: Are you blinded by your own certitude? ...or do you realize that your perspective is limited? Do you think that what you believe is right and everyone else is wrong? ...or do you know that the truth is only relative?Do you think "the truth" can only be found in the one and only true way? ...or do you have an open mind and heart?Does your particular perspective or belief system also happen to be the one and only true way? ...or do you see the fallacy of your beliefs?Do you believe in a one-size-fits-all version of how you think things should be that should apply to everyone else? ...or do you believe in true freedom of the mind?Does the position, ideology, or policy you support cause you to be against the opposite? ...or do you see beyond the veils of illusion?Do you think different is wrong? ...or do you think different is interesting?Are you traditionalistic, fundamentalist, racist, sexist, elitist, nationalistic, insular, or divisive in some way? ...or do you think there is much to learn from all angles of society and culture?Are you wrong? Are you right?If so, then this book is for you!!! ...but only if you open your mind.
author: Laren Grey Umphlett
